products.name: Nest Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat 3rd Generation
products.shortDescription: Turn yours into a smart home with the Nest Learning Thermostat. It remembers what temperatures you like, learns your schedule, and programs itself to save energy. Its sharp 2.08" LCD display with Farsight lights up when you approach. WiFi connected, you can control it with your mobile device, and use it with numerous compatible smart home products.

products.name: NETGEAR Arlo Wireless Indoor/Outdoor Security System with 4 720p Cameras - White - Only at Best Buy
products.shortDescription: Help safeguard your home under the watchful eye of the Netgear Arlo smart home security system. Suitable indoors and out, it features 4 weatherproof, wire-free cameras that record super-clear HD footage you can access from virtually anywhere thanks to a free app on your smartphone or tablet.

products.name: D-Link Wireless Day/Night Home Network Security Camera (DCS-942L/RE) - Refurbished
products.shortDescription: *Refurbished. The D-Link Enhanced Wireless Day/Night Home Network Camera is smaller than your average wallet so you can place it virtually anywhere in your home or office. Featuring built-in WiFi, this camera can be remotely accessed on your smartphone via the mydlink app. It comes equipped with 2-way audio, motion detection, night vision, and more.

products.name: Night Owl Wired 8 Channel 1TB Security System with 4 1080p Bullet Cameras - Black/White
products.shortDescription: Deter criminal activity and capture critical evidence with the Night Owl 8-channel 1080p AHD video security system. It includes 8 wired 1080p AHD cameras and a DVR with a 1TB hard drive that supports previous Night Owl and other analog NBC cameras, with no rewiring required. You can get motion alerts, and view or playback video from your mobile device.

products.name: Ring Wi-Fi Video Doorbell Pro - Bilingual
products.shortDescription: Know who's knockin' at your door with the Ring Video Doorbell Pro. Even better than the original Ring Video Doorbell, the Wi-Fi-enabled Pro features Full HD 1080p video so you can see who's at your door with clarity and detail. It also comes with advanced motion detection to keep you informed of any activity in front of your home.

products.name: Nest Cam WiFi Indoor IP Camera - Black
products.shortDescription: Check in on your home from nearly anywhere using Nest Cam. Simply pull out your phone or tablet to keep a watchful eye over your home and its occupants, anywhere you're connected to the web. Wired for power, it offers a 24/7 live stream, never dead batteries. You can view video in super-clear Full HD 1080p, and get mobile alerts if something happens.

products.name: Ring WiFi 720p Video Doorbell - Satin Nickel
products.shortDescription: See who's there with the Ring Video Doorbell. Battery operated and WiFi enabled, it lets you view live HD video, hear audio, and communicate using your compatible smartphone or tablet -- from anywhere. It features motion sensors that detect movement up to 30 feet, sends you automatic alerts, and stores recorded footage to the cloud.

products.name: Philips Hue A19 Smart LED Light Bulb Starter Kit (458967) - Multi-colour
products.shortDescription: Light up your home with creativity and convenience via the Philips Hue smart light bulb starter kit. With your smart device as your control centre, you have a variety of lighting options at your fingertips. The lights can be adjusted to encourage specific moods or programmed to work as handy alarms and timers. Hue works with HomeKit and Nest.

products.name: ecobee3 HomeKit-Enabled Wi-Fi Smart Thermostat (EB-STATe3c-02)
products.shortDescription: Keep your home cozy with the ecobee3 smart thermostat. Rather than measuring temperature where the thermostat is, ecobee3 uses wireless remote sensors to measure occupancy and temperature to deliver better comfort in the rooms that matter most. It knows when to turn the heat up or down based on your home's energy profile and the weather outside.

products.name: Lorex Wireless 4-Channel 8GB Security System with 2 720p Cameras & Monitor - Black - Only at Best Buy
products.shortDescription: The Lorex LW2772H wireless indoor/outdoor surveillance system keeps two 720p cameras on guard duty day and night, season to season, to help protect your home and belongings. It sends footage and motion detection alerts to your mobile devices to give you peace of mind, even when you're away from home.

products.name: Swann 4-Channel 500GB DVR Security System with 2 Bullet 720p Cameras - White
products.shortDescription: Keep watch and capture evidence of activity around your home or business with this Swann 4-channel 500GB DVR security system. It features two 720p HD indoor/outdoor cameras with night vision and motion detection. View live video from your compatible iOS or Android mobile device, and receive notifications when activity is detected.

products.name: Swann 4-Channel 500GB DVR Security System with 2 Cameras (SWDVK-4ALP12-CA) - Black
products.shortDescription: Keep watch and capture crucial evidence of activity around your home or business with this Swann 4-channel 500GB DVR security system. It features two 650TVL indoor/outdoor cameras with night vision and motion detection. View live video from your compatible iOS or Android mobile device, and receive notifications when activity is detected.

products.name: D-Link Wireless N Network Camera - Refurbished
products.shortDescription: *Refurbished. Keep an eye on your kids, pets, home or office from almost anywhere. The mydlink-enabled Wireless N Network Camera DCS-930L comes with everything you need to quickly add surveillance to your home or small office network. Simply connect the cables, plug in the camera, run the short installation wizard and setup is complete.

products.name: August Doorbell Cam - Silver
products.shortDescription: Know who's there without having to ask with the August Doorbell Cam. Stylish and easy to install, it connects via Blutooth and WiFi and sends alerts to your smartphone whenever anyone rings your bell or triggers the built-in motion sensors. View HD video, speak with visitors, and even use it to remotely control your August Smart Lock (sold separately).

products.name: NETGEAR Arlo Wireless Indoor/Outdoor Security System with 2 720p Cameras - White
products.shortDescription: Help safeguard your home under the watchful eye of the Netgear Arlo smart home security system. Suitable indoors and out, it features 2 weatherproof, wire-free cameras that record super-clear HD footage you can access from virtually anywhere thanks to a free app on your smartphone or tablet.

products.name: NETGEAR Arlo Q Wi-Fi Indoor 1080p IP Camera - White
products.shortDescription: Keep an eye on the places and people you care about with the NETGEAR Arlo Q security camera. Perfect for your home or office, this camera records sharp Full HD footage you can access from virtually anywhere thanks to the free Arlo app on your smartphone or tablet. Night vision, 2-way audio, and motion alerts offer extra security.

products.name: Motorola FOCUS73 Outdoor Wi-Fi Camera
products.shortDescription: Monitor your home's exterior from any internet enabled device with the Motorola FOCUS73 remote Wi-Fi outdoor camera. It features motion sensors and can alert you to any activity via notifications to your mobile device. Stream live 720p HD video to your smartphone, tablet, or computer, where you can record, take an image snapshot, and tilt, pan, or zoom.

products.name: August Smart Lock HomeKit-Enabled - Silver
products.shortDescription: Get easy access to your home without the need for keys or codes with the HomeKit enabled August Smart Lock. It installs easily and can be conveniently controlled by your smartphone. You can set who has access to your home and for how long. It can also automatically unlock when it senses your approach, so you don't need to fumble for your keys.

products.name: August Bluetooth Smart Lock (100-100-200-C) - Dark Grey
products.shortDescription: Get easy access to your home without the need for keys or codes with the August Smart Lock. This device easily installs inside your door so you can control who has access to your home and for how long from your smartphone. It can also automatically unlock the door when it senses your approach so you don't need to fumble for your keys.

products.name: NETGEAR Arlo Wireless Indoor/Outdoor Security System with 3 720p Cameras - White
products.shortDescription: Help safeguard your home under the watchful eye of the Netgear Arlo smart home security system. Suitable indoors and out, it features 3 weatherproof, wire-free cameras that record super-clear HD footage you can access from virtually anywhere thanks to a free app on your smartphone or tablet.

products.name: August Doorbell Cam - Dark Grey
products.shortDescription: Know who's there without having to ask with the August Doorbell Cam. Stylish and easy to install, it connects via Blutooth and WiFi and sends alerts to your smartphone whenever anyone rings your bell or triggers the built-in motion sensors. View HD video, speak with visitors, and even use it to remotely control your August Smart Lock (sold separately).

products.name: D-Link Wi-Fi HD Pan & Tilt Day/Night Network Camera (DCS-5030L)
products.shortDescription: How would you like to be able to keep an eye on things at home no matter where you are? Well, you can do just that with the mydlink DCS-5030L Wi-Fi HD Pan & Tilt Day/Night Network Camera. It offers crystal-clear, around-the-clock surveillance you can access remotely anytime you want via the free mydlink Lite app on your smartphone or tablet.

products.name: dbell Wi-Fi Smart Video Doorbell (DB01-B) - Only at Best Buy
products.shortDescription: Find out who's at your front door even if you aren’t home with the WiFi smart video doorbell from dbell. This doorbell is easy to install and connects to your WiFi network so you can remotely access it on your smartphone or tablet through the dbell app. The handy dbell app alerts you when guests arrive and allows you to see, hear, and talk to them.

products.name: Night Owl Wired 8-Channel 1TB DVR Security System with 4 Bullet 720p Cameras - Black
products.shortDescription: Deter criminal activity and capture critical evidence with the Night Owl 8-channel 1080p Lite HD video analog security system. It includes 4 wired HD 720p cameras and a DVR with a 1TB hard drive that supports expansion up to 8 compatible cameras, including 1080p Full HD. You can get motion alerts, and view or playback video from your mobile device.

products.name: Ring Stick Up Wireless Outdoor 720p IP Camera - Black - Bilingual
products.shortDescription: Monitor and interact with anyone on your property from anywhere in the world with the Ring Stick Up Cam. This wire-free, outdoor camera connects to your Wi-Fi network so you can remotely access it on your mobile device via the Ring app. Night vision provides 24/7 surveillance, while 2-way audio lets you chat with guests at your front door.

products.name: D-Link Vigilance Full HD Outdoor Vandal-Proof PoE Dome Security Camera (DCS-4602EV) - White - English
products.shortDescription: Keep watch and record vital evidence when your business or home property is disturbed with the D-Link DCS-4602EV Vigilance Full HD Outdoor Vandal-Proof PoE Dome Camera. Powered and connected by a single Ethernet cable, it records 1080p video and captures detailed colours in all lighting conditions, with IR night vision.

products.name: TP-Link Day/Night Cloud IP Camera (NC220) - White
products.shortDescription: Keep an eye on what matters most with the TP-LINK NC220 wireless IP camera. Whether you're at work or play, you can see what's happening at home, day or night. Motion detection triggers recordings and sends you email or FTP notifications. You can view and manage settings from the tpCamera app for iOS or Android smartphones, or via the online portal.

products.name: SkylinkNet Security Solutions Home Alarm System (SKBB-2S) - Only at Best Buy
products.shortDescription: Protecting your home or office just got easier with the SkylinkNet SKBB-2S connected home alarm system. Simply connect the SkylinkNet internet hub to your existing network router and place the door/window sensors and you're ready to go. The companion app lets you arm or disarm the system, and sends alerts if the system detects anything.

products.name: SkylinkNet Wireless Outdoor 720p HD IP Camera (WC-510PH) - White
products.shortDescription: Keep a watchful eye on your premises with this outdoor camera from SkylinkNet. It records content in crystal-clear 720p HD with night vision capabilities. In the middle of the night, you can access the app on your smartphone and check if that noise you heard outside was a rummaging cat or a potential security threat.

products.name: NETGEAR Arlo Wireless Indoor/Outdoor Security System with 1 720p Camera - White
products.shortDescription: Help safeguard your home under the watchful eye of the Netgear Arlo smart home security system. Suitable indoors and out, it features a weatherproof, wire-free camera that records super-clear HD footage you can access from virtually anywhere thanks to a free app on your smartphone or tablet.

products.name: MIPOW PLAYBULB rainbow A19 Smart LED Light Bulb (BTL200) - Multi-colour
products.shortDescription: Make moods and moments come alive with colour thanks to the MIPOW PLAYBULB rainbow smart LED light bulb. Controllable via Bluetooth on your smart device, this dimmable smart light bulb can emit millions of colours to suit any mood or occasion. Its long life and energy efficiency make it an ideal replacement for any standard light bulb.

products.name: Motorola FOCUS86 1080p Full HD Home Camera - Only at Best Buy
products.shortDescription: Monitor your home from any internet enabled device with the Motorola FOCUS86 remote WiFi camera. It features sound, motion, and temperature sensors, and can alert you to any activity via notifications to your mobile device. Stream live 1080p Full HD video to your smartphone, tablet, or computer -- or record it via the built-in SD card slot.
